attributes.legal-text:
LocoRoco is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. © 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other terms of conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.long-description:
Experience the newest LocoRoco™ adventure to its fullest in this incredible bundle that includes the full game of LocoRoco™ Midnight Carnival, additional levels with the Midnight Carnival BuiBui Level Pack, and a special Midnight Carnival Strategy Guide!

The mischievous Bui Bui have invited the LocoRoco to their biggest challenge yet...The Midnight Carnival! Now explode into the air as you navigate through an ever-tilting world that literally has you bouncing off the walls! Challenge friends for highest score or play via ad-hoc and infrastructure through 16 levels. Test your skills and see if you can get the LocoRoco through the Midnight Carnival!

Features include:
New Super Jump Ability!
2 New Mini-games
Global Leaderboards
Competitive and Co-Op Multiplayer Modes via Ad-Hoc and Infrastucture
New LocoRoco™ accessories to unlock!
attributes.name: LocoRoco™ Midnight Carnival Bundle
